classes.title: DaVinci Cowl - Session 1 - 1st class of 2
dates.cost: Free - yarns to be purchased in store
dates.description:
Sound Intriguing?  Come and figure out your secret code and then see the colours
pool magically before your eyes.  Easy to do,  just 2 classes . Materials needed - 4mm x 32in circular needle & 1 skein Sweet Georgia Tough Love Sock yarn

dates.title: Diamond Kerchief Cowl - Session 1 - 1st class of 2
dates.cost: Free - yarns to be purchased in store
dates.description:
A great cowl to tuck into your jacket on those cold mornings that are coming.
If you’ve wanted to learn simple lace and increases & working in the round then this is the cowl KAL for you. Materials needed - 4.5mm x 24in circular needle & 1 skein Ultra Alpaca

dates.title: Thrummed Mittens - Session 1 - 1st class of 2
dates.cost: Free - yarns to be purchased in store
dates.description:
Let’s get ready for winter! Do you have a special someone that you want to keep warm?  
Here is an easy way to make thrummed mittens, on just 2 needles. Materials needed - 3.25mm & 4mm needles, 1 skein Berocco Vintage & Rovings

dates.description: 4mm needles and any dk yarn

dates.title: Ruby’s Hat - Session 1 - 1st class of 2
dates.cost: Free - yarns to be purchased in store
dates.description:
Here is a cute little hat for a special someone.  It incorporates short rows, and picking up
stitches.  Very easy, yarn does all the colour changing for you. Materials needed - 4mm x 40cm circular needle and 1 ball of Riot
